significant_trade.description: A trade is considered significant if its dollar amount is at least $1000. Focus on analyzing these trades to understand their success factors.

large_loss.description: A loss is considered large if it reaches or exceeds $500. Review these losses carefully to understand and mitigate risks.

high_win_rate.description: A win rate is considered high if it is 75% or above. Strive to maintain this rate for a sustainable trading strategy.

long_trade_duration.description: A trade duration is considered long if it is 48 hours or more. Evaluate the impact of holding trades for extended periods.

replicate_successful_strategies.action: Analyze the market conditions, entry and exit points, and other factors that led to successful trades. Document these factors and look for patterns to replicate in future trades.
replicate_successful_strategies.description: Successful trades often follow specific patterns or strategies. By documenting and analyzing these factors, you can identify successful strategies and replicate them in the future.

learn_from_mistakes.action: Conduct a thorough review of trades that resulted in losses. Identify what went wrong and implement changes to avoid making the same mistakes in the future.
learn_from_mistakes.description: Learning from mistakes is crucial. By understanding the reasons behind losses, you can avoid repeating the same errors and improve your trading strategy.

focus_profitable_symbols.action: Allocate more resources and focus on trading symbols that have consistently brought profits. Monitor these symbols closely and adjust strategies as needed.
focus_profitable_symbols.description: Symbols that consistently yield profits should be the focus of your trading efforts. By allocating more resources to these symbols, you can maximize returns.

review_unprofitable_symbols.action: Analyze why certain symbols resulted in losses and either refine your strategy for these symbols or reduce exposure.
review_unprofitable_symbols.description: Unprofitable symbols can drag down overall performance. By understanding why these symbols are underperforming, you can decide whether to adjust your strategy or reduce exposure.

diversified_strategy.action: Avoid putting all your capital into a single trade. Diversify across different symbols, sectors, and trading strategies to spread risk.
diversified_strategy.description: Diversification is key to managing risk. Spread your investments across various symbols, sectors, and strategies to minimize the impact of any single loss.

continuous_improvement.action: Stay informed about the latest market trends and continuously educate yourself to refine your trading strategies. Regularly review your performance data to identify areas for improvement.
continuous_improvement.description: Continuous improvement is essential for long-term success. Keep learning, stay updated on market trends, and regularly review your performance to find opportunities for enhancement.
